metadata.title: CVE-2011-3351 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: openvas-scanner before 2011-09-11 creates a temporary file insecurely whengenerating OVAL system characteristics document with the ovaldi integratedtool enabled. A local attacker could use this flaw to conduct symlinkattacks to overwrite arbitrary files on the system.

criterions.comment: openvas-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
